attributes.action: Make Friday a half day every half term!
attributes.additional_details: Chidlren need a bit of a break from time to time and half terms/ bank holidays take quite a while to come around. Children are falling asleep every so often and just cannot wait to get out of school. Some schools apply half days but majority don't which is quite unfair. The smallest things make a huge difference.
attributes.background: I want the governmrmt to make half days for all schools across the UK a thing during the last day of half term that children have to attend.

rejection.details:
The UK Government is only responsible for schools in England, not across the whole UK.

We could accept a petition calling on the UK Government to require schools in England to have half days on the last Friday of every half-term, if that's what you want to happen.

If you start a new petition you'll need to provide your real, full name.
